Reviews.Title: Mislabeled
Reviews.Author: Russell Ty
Reviews.Content: Sansui claims this is a 22" television.  Perhaps in their dreams, but the measurement shows it to be 21" diagionally, which I believe is the standard way of measuring TVs.  The one in my motor home went out shortly after delivery and the replacement has been suspect ever since.

ProductInfo.Features:
Integrated digital tuner with ATSC and Clear QAM
1920 x 1080 resolution
Connections: HDMI, component, composite, RCA L/R stereo, PC, coaxial digital audio out, 3.5mm stereo audio out and RF
ProductInfo.Name: Sansui SLED2237 22-Inch 60Hz LED-Lit TV
